entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
